text: 'iina allah hu alely al'aelaa aldhy airtafaeat drjath artfaeana bayin bih mkhlwqath, wartfe bih qadrh, wahu sahib alearsh alezym, wamin rahmatih bieibadih 'an yursil 'iilayhim rusulana yulqi 'iilayhim alwhy aldhy yhywn bh, fykwnwn ealaa basirat min amrhm; ltkhwwif alrusul eibad allh, wtndhrhm yawm alqiamat aldhy yaltaqi fih al'awalun walakhrwn
